Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Goodman
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Jefferson Park, Milwaukee & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Goodman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Jefferson Park, Milwaukee, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Goodman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to a signal problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
